events.message: We have received an application from a software engineer candidate interested in the backend developer role.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the engineering department focusing on backend development.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the hiring process for this software engineering candidate.
Completed an initial screening call to discuss the candidate's experience in devops and software development.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in advancing to the technical interview stage.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team to assess coding and system design skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software engineering principles.
Scheduled an HR interview to discuss company culture, benefits, and other HR related topics following the technical interview.
Candidate completed the HR interview expressing enthusiasm about joining the engineering department.
Extended a formal job offer to the candidate for the software engineering position with competitive salary and benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the interview process and is carefully reviewing the proposed offer.
We have received confirmation that the candidate has accepted the job offer and is excited to join the engineering team.
The onboarding process has commenced with introduction to the software engineering team and setup of development environments.
The hiring process is now complete with the successful integration of the new software engineer into the department.
